#summary resetCycle(name)
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

*Description*:

Resets a cycle so that it starts from the first list value the next time it is called.

*Return Type*:

Void

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *name* || string || true ||  || The name of the cycle to reset. ||



*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset resetCycle("tableRows")>

}}}
